review: We use this all the time.  It is nice for a someone who cant justify having a dedicated game system.  It does kind of shove Amazon content in your face, but the Plex interface is nice.  Or you can easily sideload other free DLNA clients for free.The newest update has placed a big ad for an amazon show on the home screen which is annoying, given the same show is also listed on the "featured" amazon section.  I would like to see that removed.  BTW the cover for "transparent" freaks us out.
author: matt
